sentences.english: Catholics pray to Mary as an intercessor.
sentences.chinese: 天主教徒向玛利亚祈祷，并把她看作仲裁者。

sentences.english: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles' doctrine and fellowship, and in breaking of bread, and in prayers.
sentences.chinese: 都恒心遵守使徒的教训，彼此交接，擘饼，祈祷。

sentences.english: Speak, write, pray, and love the children entrusted to me.
sentences.chinese: 讲说，写信，祈祷，爱所有信任我的孩子。

sentences.english: During the war, my family prayed every day for peace.
sentences.chinese: 在战争期间，我的家人每天祈祷，冀求和平。

sentences.english: The staff wanted him to live and prayed with him everyday.
sentences.chinese: 工作人员鼓励他活下去，并每天与他一道做祈祷。

sentences.english: Families and communities share the happiness of gathering together for iftar and prayers.
sentences.chinese: 亲朋好友欢聚一堂，共享斋月晚餐并共同祈祷。

sentences.english: I pray that all will gain unsurpassed Enlightenment.
sentences.chinese: 我祈祷所有的生命获得无上正等正觉。

sentences.english: Women pray together at the edge of the tip at the end of Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 斋月结束之际妇女们一起聚在垃圾场的边上祈祷。

sentences.english: We prayed for the road home.
sentences.chinese: 我们为回家的路而祈祷。

sentences.english: He prayed for his friends and turned things around, enjoyed happiness after long suffering.
sentences.chinese: 为朋友祈祷，成为转捩点，苦尽甘来。

sentences.english: I would tuck you in more tightly and "pray the Lord, your soul to keep."
sentences.chinese: 我要为你紧掖好被角，祈祷上帝把你灵魂守牢。

sentences.english: PRAY】I will pray to God for your safe return.
sentences.chinese: 我会向上帝祈祷你的平安归来。

sentences.english: My hands can comb my hair and fold in prayer.
sentences.chinese: 我可以用手梳头，可以合掌祈祷。
他检了起来，于是成为他做祈祷用的幸运石。

sentences.english: It was a litany of middle-class lives shattered by the recession.
sentences.chinese: 这是中产阶级因经济萧条而为生活发出的祈祷。

sentences.english: But pray the ability fearlessness of face them.
sentences.chinese: 但祈祷能无畏的面对它们。

definition: to pray/to pray for sth/to wish sth/prayer/wish
to make a wish/to make a vow/to promise a reward
